member.name: T:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo
member.summary: Information about the availability of a catchable item.
member.param: The base chance this will be caught. This is not a percentage chance, but rather a weight relative to all available entries.

member.name: M:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.#ctor(System.Double)
member.summary: Information about the availability of a catchable item.
member.param: The base chance this will be caught. This is not a percentage chance, but rather a weight relative to all available entries.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.StartTime
member.summary: Time this becomes available (inclusive).

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.EndTime
member.summary: Time this is no longer available (exclusive).

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.SeasonsSplit
member.summary: Used for JSON serialization. Prefer .

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.Seasons
member.summary: Seasons this can be caught in.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.WeathersSplit
member.summary: Used for JSON serialization. Prefer .

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.Weathers
member.summary: Weathers this can be caught in.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.WaterTypesSplit
member.summary: Used for JSON serialization. Prefer .

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.WaterTypes
member.summary: The type of water this can be caught in. Each location handles this differently.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.MinFishingLevel
member.summary: Required fishing level to catch this.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.MaxFishingLevel
member.summary: Maximum fishing level required to catch this, or null for no max.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.IncludeLocations
member.summary: List of locations this should be available in. Leaving this empty will make this available everywhere. Some locations have special handling. For example, the mines use the location names "UndergroundMine" and "UndergroundMine/N", where N is the floor number (both location names are valid for the floor).

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.ExcludeLocations
member.summary: List of locations this should not be available in. This takes priority over .

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.Position
member.summary: Constraints on the bobber's position on the map when fishing.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.FarmerPosition
member.summary: Constraints on the farmer's position on the map when fishing.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.MinDepth
member.summary: Minimum bobber depth required to catch this.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.MaxDepth
member.summary: Maximum bobber depth required to catch this.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.When
member.summary: Content Patcher conditions for when this is available.

member.name: M:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.AvailabilityInfo.GetWeightedChance(TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.FishingInfo)
member.summary: Gets the weighted chance of this being caught, if any. This does not test the conditions in .
member.param: Information about the farmer that is fishing.
member.returns: The weighted chance of this being caught, or if not available.

member.name: T:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.CatchActions
member.summary: Actions to be executed on catch.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.CatchActions.CustomEvents
member.summary: Raise custom events with this name to notify SMAPI mods that this was caught. Event key format is "namespace:key" (for example "TehPers.FishingOverhaul:GoldenWalnut").

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.CatchActions.SetFlags
member.summary: Sets one or more mail flags.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.CatchActions.StartQuests
member.summary: Sets one or more quests as active.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.CatchActions.AddMail
member.summary: Adds mail entries to the player's mail tomorrow.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.CatchActions.StartConversations
member.summary: Starts conversations. The key is the conversation ID and the value is the number of days.

member.name: M:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.CatchActions.OnCatch(TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.IFishingApi,TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.CatchInfo)
member.summary: Executes these actions.
member.param: The fishing API.
The catch information.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.TreasureEntry.MinQuantity
member.summary: The minimum quantity of this item. This is only valid for stackable items.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.TreasureEntry.MaxQuantity
member.summary: The maximum quantity of this item. This is only valid for stackable items.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.TreasureEntry.AllowDuplicates
member.summary: Whether this can be found multiple times in one chest.

member.name: T:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.TreasureEntryFilter
member.summary: Treasure entry filter.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.TreasureEntryFilter.ItemKeys
member.summary: The namespaced keys of the treasure. This must match every listed item key in the entry you want to remove. For example, if an entry lists bait, stone, and wood as its possible item keys, you must list *all* of those to remove it.

member.name: P:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.TreasureEntryFilter.AnyWithItem
member.summary: A namespaced key in the treasure entry. Any entry that can produce this item will be removed. This takes precedence over (if both are listed and this condition is matched, then is ignored).

member.name: M:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.TreasureEntryFilter.Matches(TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.Content.TreasureEntry)
member.summary: Checks if the entry matches this filter.
member.param: The entry to check.
member.returns: Whether the entry matches this filter.

member.name: M:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.FishingInfo.GetDefaultLocationNames(StardewValley.GameLocation)
member.summary:
Gets the location names associated with a . Some locations have names in addition to their normal names:
"UndergroundMine/#", where # is the floor number.
"Farm/X", where X is one of "Standard", "Riverland", "Forest", "Hills", "Wilderness", or "FourCorners". Only vanilla farms have this name.
"Island".
member.param: The location to get the names of.
member.returns: The location's names.

member.summary: Gets the fish from a at the given tile if possible.

The tile the bobber is on.
If , simulates taking the fish. Otherwise, actually pulls the fish from the pond.

member.name: T:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.ISimplifiedFishingApi
member.summary:
Simplified API for working with fishing. Prefer if possible.
You can copy this interface directly into your mod and use it with SMAPI's mod registry.

member.summary: Gets the fish that can be caught. This does not take into account fish ponds.
member.param: The that is fishing.
The bobber depth.

member.summary: Gets the chance that a fish would be caught. This does not take into account whether there are actually fish to catch at the 's location. If no fish can be caught, then the will always catch trash.
member.param: The catching the fish.
member.returns: The chance a fish would be caught instead of trash.

member.summary: Gets the chance that treasure will be found during the fishing minigame.

member.name: M:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.ISimplifiedFishingApi.ModifyChanceForFish(System.Func{StardewValley.Farmer,System.Double,System.Double})
member.summary: Modifies the chance that a fish would be caught. The provided callback is invoked every time is called to modify the resulting chance before it's returned. Modifiers are invoked in the order they are registered.
member.param: The chance modifier function. The input arguments are the and the calculated chance, and the return value is the modified chance.

member.name: M:TehPers.FishingOverhaul.Api.ISimplifiedFishingApi.ModifyChanceForTreasure(System.Func{StardewValley.Farmer,System.Double,System.Double})
member.summary: Modifies the chance that treasure would be found while fishing. The provided callback is invoked every time is called to modify the resulting chance before it's returned. Modifiers are invoked in the order they are registered.
member.param: The chance modifier function. The input arguments are the and the calculated chance, and the return value is the modified chance.

member.param: The item key of the fish as a stringified namespaced key.
member.returns: Whether that fish is legendary.
